$sessionHandler = SessionHandler::fromClient($dynamoDb, [
    'table_name' => 'sessions',
    'hash_key' => 'id',
    'session_lifetime' => 3600,
    'consistent_read' => true,
    'locking' => false,
    'batch_config' => [],
    'max_lock_wait_time' => 10,
    'min_lock_retry_microtime' => 5000,
    'max_lock_retry_microtime' => 50000,
]);
